data.prayer: Father, if there is even one of the 223,145 believers in Cunene, Angola who does not have a Bible, please provide them one today.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Cunene, Angola
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Cunene, Angola, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Cunene to agree with you and with one another.
Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Cunene.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Chinese, general people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Cunene.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Cunene, Angola today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.section_summary:
the state of Cunene, Angola has a population of 965,300.

We estimate Cunene has 223,145 people who might know Jesus, 662,138 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 80,017 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Cunene words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."
